description: This file defines the routing for schedule-related API endpoints in an Express.js application, including endpoints for listing, creating, retrieving, updating, deleting schedules, and additional functionalities like conflict checking and suggestions.

methods.name: router.get('/api/schedules')
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve a list of schedules with optional filters.

methods.name: router.post('/api/schedules')
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new schedule, with optional conflict allowance.

methods.name: router.get('/api/schedules/:id')
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve a specific schedule by ID.

methods.name: router.put('/api/schedules/:id')
methods.description: Handles PUT requests to update an existing schedule, with optional conflict allowance.

methods.name: router.delete('/api/schedules/:id')
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to remove a schedule by ID.

methods.name: router.post('/api/schedules/conflicts')
methods.description: Checks for conflicts for a candidate schedule.

methods.name: router.post('/api/schedules/suggest')
methods.description: Suggests the next available time slot for scheduling.
